battlecode.common

Class RobotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • battlecode.common.RobotInfo

  • public class RobotInfo
extends Object
    Struct that stores basic information that was 'sensed' of another Robot. This info is ephemeral and there is no guarantee any of it will remain the same between rounds.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      MapLocation builder
      For structures being built, this will be the location of the unit building the structure (null if N/A).
      MapLocation buildingLocation
      For units that are building a structure, this will be the location of the structure being built (null if N/A).
      double coreDelay 
      double health 
      int ID 
      MapLocation location 
      int missileCount
      LAUNCHER only.
      double supplyLevel 
      Team team 
      RobotType type 
      double weaponDelay 
      int xp
      COMMANDER only.
